original_text: Jesus heard what the Pharisees were saying. He said to them, ‘People who are well do not need a doctor. It is people who are ill that need a doctor.
korean_text: 예수께서 들으시고 이르시되 건강한 자에게는 의사가 쓸 데 없고 병든 자에게라야 쓸 데 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus heard what the Pharisees were saying
People who are well do not need a doctor
It is people who are ill that need a doctor
